paper.title: XID II: Statistical Cross-Association of ROSAT Bright Source Catalog X-ray Sources with 2MASS Point Source Catalog Near-Infrared Sources
paper.authors: Haakonsen, Christian Bernt; Rutledge, Robert E.
paper.journal: The Astrophysical Journal Supplement, Volume 184, Issue 1, pp. 138-151 (2009).
